iata:incotermsCode.description: Standard codes as defined by ICC that correspond to international rules for the interpretation of the most commonly used trade terms in different countries.

iata:incotermsCityCode.description: Identifier of the point or port of departure, shipment or destination, as required under the applicable delivery term. UN/LOCODE code list

iata:incotermsCityName.description: if no UN/LOCODE available, the city name in full

iata:incotermsCountryCode.description: if no UN/LOCODE available, the ISO country code

iata:incotermsCountryName.description: if no UN/LOCODE available and no ISO country code available, the country name in full
